none.description:
{Golden Emperor's Heaven-Burning Slash}

Thoroughly activate the different fire of the Golden Emperor's Heaven-Burning Flame and transform it into a thousand-zhang-long golden light beam to slash down. It will cause 80 points of damage to the enemy.
